website_summaries.verdict: Cute and comfortable track and field shoe with removable spike plate.
pros: Rubber sole designed to increase running speed
Available in a pink and gray combination and a blue and teal combination
Most buyers loved the fit and look of this shoe
cons: This shoe runs small, so order one to two sizes up from usual

customer_reviews.title: Great track shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter finds this track shoes very comfortable. She is having great starts and we think these shoes make running easier. She also uses them for long jump. The spikes are the perfect length. We bought a half size bigger and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: drmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but order a whole size up
customer_reviews.text: Order a whole size up. Shoe seems well made. Only worry is with the laces, as they seem thin. Bought for track.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ran her first meet this last weekend with them and actually one of her friends borrow them because they had forgot there's and absolutely loved it and going to purchase something there self. They run about a half a size smaller than a normal shoe. but very comfortable and not too tight on the foot
customer_reviews.author: Tawnia Bates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter got these for track and says these fit well and make her go faster. WIn.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Crane

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. My daughter really likes them. Order a size or two up. My daughter wears a 7. We ordered a 8 and it fits fine. But could have went up to 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor purchase
customer_reviews.text: I worked out in these spikes three times a week for a month and they’re completely ripped. The laces are literally ripping apart from the shoe by the toes. I’m very disappointed in this purchase. My last pair of spikes lasted me 5 years while these lasted 5 weeks. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Athletics
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my granddaughter who is active in tract meets. She said they are "awesome".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get a size bigger than your regular shoe size cause they are small cause there track shoes
customer_reviews.author: Angie Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! I just needed to pay attention that they run super small. Easy return though and waiting on the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the look and the comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chakakhan Brown

customer_reviews.title: in the description, it says it is rubber sole ...
customer_reviews.text: in the description, it says it is rubber sole. It is not rubber sole at all it is plastic. had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Flores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's 3 pair of spitfire's she's a winner in them!!!
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: great fit! im a 100m and 400m runner
customer_reviews.text: great fit! im a 100m and 400m runner, its exactly how spikes are supposed to fit:not too tight yet not too loose!
customer_reviews.author: lidee03

product_meta.title: Saucony Women's Spitfire 4 Track Shoe
product_meta.description: 7 pin pebax spike plate, molded quarter cage,
